english: How much does this cost?
Do you accept credit cards?
Can I pay in cash?
Where is the fitting room?
Do you have this in a different size?
Do you have this in a different color?
Is there a discount on this?
Can I get a receipt, please?
I’m just looking, thank you.
Can I return this if it doesn’t fit?
czech: Mohu to vrátit, pokud mi to nebude sedět?

english: Where can I find the dairy section?
Do you sell organic products?
Can you help me find this item?
czech: Můžete mi pomoci najít tuto položku?

english: Do you have fresh bread?
Can you gift-wrap this?
Can I try this on?
Do you have this item in stock?
What are your opening hours?
Where can I find the checkout?
Do you offer home delivery?
Can I exchange this for a different item?
czech: Mohu to vyměnit za jinou položku?

english: Are there any special offers today?
Do you have a loyalty program?
Can you show me where this product is?
czech: Můžete mi ukázat, kde je tento produkt?

english: Can I speak to the manager?
